titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8325

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, 15 March 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec: of State-
Thomas J. Kirby Capt: has resigned (Date of Com: 13 Nov 1861.)
Denny J. Bruchett 1st Lieut: Promoted (date of Com: 18 Novr 1861)
Isaac Hollingsworth Capt: reported dead (date of Com: 19 Novr 1861)
John B. Babbitt Adjt promoted (date of Com: 11 Novr 1861)
S. J. Yates Surgeon has resigned (date of Com: 19 Novr 1861)
Michael Billings Quar: Mas: has resigned (date of Com: 10 Dec 1861)
Stephen Salle 2d Liuet: has resigned (date of Com: 28 Octo 1861.)

Joseph Doniphan Lt Colo has resigned (Com: dated 9 Jany. 1862)-
I send Eight Comms: for record.
1862 Mar 9- Kavanaugh Bullock Capt: #1 ✓
1862 Feb 1- Akin C. Miller Surgeon #2 ✓
Mar 1- Drury J Burchett Capt: #3 ✓
"- Andrew J Fox 1st Lieut #4 ✓
"- Tho D. Markham 2d Lieut #5 ✓
"- John B. Babbitt Capt #6 ✓
"- Bluford F. Hale 2d Lieut #7 ✓
". Edward J. Roberts Adjt #8 ✓

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
